thread.section_title: BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services | beliteweight.com
thread.title: Pam
thread.title_full: BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services reviewed by Pam

author: Pam
title: Pam
text: I never one time felt like I was unsafe in Juarez Mexico. They picked us up in El Paso an went straight to hospital. The Dr's were all wonderful. They all talk English an keep you very informed. The hospital was very clean an as nice as anyone in the states. I saw all the Drs, a Psychological dr, a nutritionist. They told me to call them if I wver.have any questions. After it was time for me to go home, the shuttle delivered.us right back to our truck in El Paso. I have not regretted one minute of this trip.
